title: Cuts & online catch-up: Carrefour seeks road ahead
text:
Cuts & online catch-up: Carrefour seeks road ahead 5:12pm GMT - 01:42 
Carrefour's new chief executive has promised to slash costs, step up e-commerce investment in the face of competition from Amazon and open up Carrefour China to local investors, sending its shares higher. As David Pollard reports, Carrefour is playing catch-up in online retail.
